title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Salt Lake City, UT, USA
description:
Hosted by Pluralsight. 
Facilitated by Zhon Johansen. 
Location sponsored by:
 Salt Lake Community College - Miller Campus
 Miller Corporate Partnership Center
 Miller Business Innovation Center.
 This is where we hold Utah Software Craftsmanship meetings. 
We will be starting the first session right at 9:00, so please be a bit early to get settled.

I'm looking forward to this!
What time is the party starting?
If anyone has any food restrictions at all, please post here if you are comfortable or email me directly at david.adsit@gmail.com.
@Sean, Food starts 8:30 am, Introduction starts at 9.
To be better prepared to learn, you will want to do the following before saturday: 
 
 code up the GOL (game of life) at least once 
 prepare your laptop (desktop?) for programming 
 read implementations of GOL in different languages 
 
I look forward to seeing you Saturday, it will be a great time!
Booya!Â  Let's code it in TECO (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TECO_(text_editor))!
Beverages will be provided, but the selection will be limited so please bring the caffeinated beverages of your choice if you feel you will need it.
Should I also bring a cooler to keep my drinks frosty cold?
I will have a cooler with ice and water bottles, so you can put stuff in there if you like.
